df-full
blocks.content: Function returning all the full functors from a category ` C ` to a category ` D ` . A full functor is a functor in which all the morphism maps ` G ( X , Y ) ` between objects ` X , Y e. C ` are surjections. Definition 3.27(3) in [Adamek] p. 34. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-full(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cful, cmpo(s0, s1, ccat, ccat, copab(s2, s3, wa(wbr(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfunc, cv(s1)), cv(s3)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s5, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s5))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(chom, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-full(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ Full =(s0 ‚àà Cat, s1 ‚àà Cat ‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |(s2[(s0[Func]s1)]s3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0), ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà(Base ` s0), ran((s4[s3]s5))=((s2 ` s4)[(Hom ` s1)](s2 ` s5)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: df-fth
blocks.content: Function returning all the faithful functors from a category ` C ` to a category ` D ` . A faithful functor is a functor in which all the morphism maps ` G ( X , Y ) ` between objects ` X , Y e. C ` are injections. Definition 3.27(2) in [Adamek] p. 34. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-fth(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cfth, cmpo(s0, s1, ccat, ccat, copab(s2, s3, wa(wbr(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfunc, cv(s1)), cv(s3)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s5, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s5))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-fth(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ Faith =(s0 ‚àà Cat, s1 ‚àà Cat ‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |(s2[(s0[Func]s1)]s3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0), ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà(Base ` s0), Fun(`'(s4[s3]s5)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: fullfunc
blocks.content: A full functor is a functor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fullfunc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(co(c0, cful, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(co(c0, cful, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat)))
  vtocl2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, ccat, c1, ccat, wss(co(c0, cful, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1)), wss(co(cv(hs0), cful, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, cful, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1))))
  sseq12d(co(cv(hs0), cful, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cful, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cful, cv(hs1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfunc, cv(hs1))
  sseq12d(co(c0, cful, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cful, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0, cful)
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0, cfunc)
  syl6eqss(co(cv(hs0), cful, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ccat), wcel(cv(hs1), ccat)))
  mp3an3(wcel(cv(hs0), ccat), wcel(cv(hs1), ccat), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cful, cv(hs1)), copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5))))))))), wcel(copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))), universe))
  ssexi(copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)))
  ovex(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1))
  ovmpt4g(hs0, hs1, ccat, ccat, copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))), universe, cful)
  sstri(copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), copab(hs2, hs3, wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3))))
  ssopab2i(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5))))))), wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)))
  simpl(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))
  opabss(hs2, hs3, co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)))
  syl6eqss(co(c0, cful, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat))))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, ccat, c1, ccat, cful, copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4)), cfv(chom, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs5)))))))))
  df-full(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  0ss(co(c0, cfunc, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ccat)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(co(c0, cful, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(co(c0, cful, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1)))
  diff.hs2.c(co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs3.c(co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fullfunc(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[Full]c1)‚äÜ(c0[Func]c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0[Full]c1)‚äÜ(c0[Func]c1), (c0 ‚àà Cat ‚àß c1 ‚àà Cat))
  vtocl2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, ccat, c1, ccat, (c0[Full]c1)‚äÜ(c0[Func]c1), (hs0[Full]hs1)‚äÜ(hs0[Func]hs1), (c0[Full]hs1)‚äÜ(c0[Func]hs1))
  sseq12d((hs0[Full]hs1), (hs0[Func]hs1), (c0[Full]hs1), (c0[Func]hs1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cful, hs1)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cfunc, hs1)
  sseq12d((c0[Full]hs1), (c0[Func]hs1), (c0[Full]c1), (c0[Func]c1), hs1 = c1)
  oveq2(hs1, c1, c0, cful)
  oveq2(hs1, c1, c0, cfunc)
  syl6eqss((hs0[Full]hs1), (hs0[Func]hs1), { < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))}, (hs0 ‚àà Cat ‚àß hs1 ‚àà Cat))
  mp3an3(hs0 ‚àà Cat, hs1 ‚àà Cat, (hs0[Full]hs1)= { < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))}, { < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))} ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexi({ < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))}, (hs0[Func]hs1))
  ovex(hs0, cfunc, hs1)
  ovmpt4g(hs0, hs1, ccat, ccat, { < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))}, universe, cful)
  sstri({ < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))}, (hs0[Func]hs1), { < hs2, hs3 > | hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 })
  ssopab2i(hs2, hs3, (hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5))))), hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3)
  simpl(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3, ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))
  opabss(hs2, hs3, (hs0[Func]hs1))
  syl6eqss((c0[Full]c1), (c0[Func]c1), emptycls, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà Cat ‚àß c1 ‚àà Cat))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, ccat, c1, ccat, cful, { < hs2, hs3 > |(hs2[(hs0[Func]hs1)]hs3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ran((hs4[hs3]hs5))=((hs2 ` hs4)[(Hom ` hs1)](hs2 ` hs5)))))})
  df-full(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  0ss((c0[Func]c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ccat)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Full]hs1)‚äÜ(c0[Func]hs1))
  diff.hs1.w((c0[Full]c1)‚äÜ(c0[Func]c1))
  diff.hs2.c((hs0[Func]hs1))
  diff.hs3.c((hs0[Func]hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
}

thm fthfunc(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(co(c0, cfth, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat)))
  vtocl2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, ccat, c1, ccat, wss(co(c0, cfth, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1)), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfth, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, cfth, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1))))
  sseq12d(co(cv(hs0), cfth, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfth, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfth, cv(hs1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfunc, cv(hs1))
  sseq12d(co(c0, cfth, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfunc, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfth, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0, cfth)
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0, cfunc)
  syl6eqss(co(cv(hs0), cfth, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ccat), wcel(cv(hs1), ccat)))
  mp3an3(wcel(cv(hs0), ccat), wcel(cv(hs1), ccat), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfth, cv(hs1)), copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))), wcel(copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))), universe))
  ssexi(copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)))
  ovex(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1))
  ovmpt4g(hs0, hs1, ccat, ccat, copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))), universe, cfth)
  sstri(copab(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5)))))))), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), copab(hs2, hs3, wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3))))
  ssopab2i(hs2, hs3, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), wral(hs4, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs5, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wfun(ccnv(co(cv(hs4), cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))), wbr(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)))

  opabss(hs2, hs3, co(cv(hs0), cfunc, cv(hs1)))
  syl6eqss(co(c0, cfth, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c1), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat))))

  df-fth(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  0ss(co(c0, cfunc, c1))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))

} = {
  a1ii(wb(wbr(c0, co(c1, cful, c2), c3), wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfunc, c2), c3), wral(s0, c4, wral(s1, c4, wfo(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wb(wbr(c0, co(c1, cful, c2), c3), wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfunc, c2), c3), wral(s0, c4, wral(s1, c4, wfo(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c5))

} = {

  foelrn(s0, (c0[c4]c2), (c0[c1]c2), ((c9 ` c0)[c7](c9 ` c2)), c3)

}

blocks.name: isffth2
blocks.content: A fully faithful functor is a functor which is bijective on hom-sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2):(c0[c3]c2)‚Üî((c4 ` c0)[c5](c4 ` c2))))

  ‚ä£ c5 =(Hom ` c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4[((c7[Full]c8)‚ãÇ(c7[Faith]c8))]c1)

} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2):(c0[c3]c2)‚Üî((c4 ` c0)[c5](c4 ` c2))), ((c0[c1]c2):(c0[c3]c2)‚Ü£((c4 ` c0)[c5](c4 ` c2))), ((c0[c1]c2):(c0[c3]c2)‚Ü†((c4 ` c0)[c5](c4 ` c2))))

  simprd(w0, c4[(c7[Faith]c8)]c1, c4[(c7[Full]c8)]c1)
  fullfo(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  simpld(w0, c4[(c7[Full]c8)]c1, c4[(c7[Faith]c8)]c1)
  sylib(w0, (c4[(c7[Full]c8)]c1 ‚àß c4[(c7[Faith]c8)]c1), c4[((c7[Full]c8)‚ãÇ(c7[Faith]c8))]c1)
  brin(c4, (c7[Full]c8), (c7[Faith]c8), c1)

blocks.name: coffth

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(c1[Full]c2)]c3 ‚Üî c0[(c1[Full]c4)]c3))

} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0[(c1[Full]c2)]c3, c0[(c1[Full]c4)]c3, (c0[(c1[Func]c2)]c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c5, ran((hs0[c3]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(Hom ` c2)](c0 ` hs1))))), (c0[(c1[Func]c4)]c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c5, ran((hs0[c3]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(Hom ` c4)](c0 ` hs1))))))

  eqeq2d(ran((hs0[c3]hs1)), ((c0 ` hs0)[(Hom ` c2)](c0 ` hs1)), ((c0 ` hs0)[(Hom ` c4)](c0 ` hs1)), w0)
  oveqd((c0 ` hs0), (Hom ` c2), (c0 ` hs1), (Hom ` c4), w0)
  syl(w0, (Hom ` c2)=(Hom ` c4), c6 ‚àà c7)
  resshom(c6, c7, (Hom ` c2), c4, c2)

blocks.name: ffthres2c
blocks.content: Condition for a fully faithful functor to also be a fully faithful functor into the restriction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)

thm ffthres2c(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cin(co(c1, cful, c2), co(c1, cfth, c2)), c3), wbr(c0, cin(co(c1, cful, c4), co(c1, cfth, c4)), c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c2, cress, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c5, c6))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wbr(c0, cin(co(c1, cful, c2), co(c1, cfth, c2)), c3), wbr(c0, cin(co(c1, cful, c4), co(c1, cfth, c4)), c3), wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, cful, c2), c3), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfth, c2), c3)), wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, cful, c4), c3), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfth, c4), c3)))
  anbi12d(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cful, c2), c3), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfth, c2), c3), wbr(c0, co(c1, cful, c4), c3), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfth, c4), c3))
  fullres2c(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  fthres2c(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  brin(c0, co(c1, cful, c2), co(c1, cfth, c2), c3)
  brin(c0, co(c1, cful, c4), co(c1, cfth, c4), c3)
